item.title: Reset Cookies and force new sign-in using ASP.NET Core Identity
item.description: This post looks at implementing a cookie reset in an ASP.NET Core application using Duende identity server which federates to Entra ID. Sometimes cookies need to be reset for end users due to size problems, or unknown remote authentication server errors. The cookies can be cleared and a new sign in can be forced.
